name: jacksontable
description: Handsontable is a JavaScript Spreadsheet Component available for React, Angular and Vue.
author: Matthew Rathbone <matthew@rathbonelabs.com>

scripts.test: yarn run lint && yarn run test:unit && yarn run test:types && yarn run test:walkontable && yarn run test:e2e && yarn run test:production
scripts.test:walkontable: yarn run build:walkontable && yarn run test:walkontable.dump && yarn run test:walkontable.puppeteer
scripts.test:production: yarn run build:umd.min && yarn run build:languages.min && yarn run test:production.dump && yarn run test:e2e.puppeteer
scripts.test:e2e: yarn run build:umd && yarn run build:languages && yarn run test:e2e.dump && yarn run test:e2e.puppeteer
scripts.test:e2e.watch: node ./.config/bin/trigger-on-stdout-change.js "concurrently --raw --kill-others 'yarn run build:umd -- --watch' 'yarn run test:e2e.dump -- --watch'" "yarn run test:e2e.puppeteer"
scripts.test:production.dump: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs_e2e NODE_ENV=test-production env-cmd ./hot.config.js webpack --hide-modules helpers=./test/helpers/index.js e2e=./test/e2e/index.js
scripts.test:e2e.dump: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs_e2e NODE_ENV=test-e2e env-cmd ./hot.config.js webpack --hide-modules helpers=./test/helpers/index.js e2e=./test/e2e/index.js
scripts.test:mobile.dump: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs_e2e NODE_ENV=test-mobile env-cmd ./hot.config.js webpack --hide-modules helpers=./test/helpers/index.js mobile=./test/e2e/mobile/index.js
scripts.build: yarn run build:commonjs && yarn run build:es && yarn run build:umd && yarn run build:umd.min && yarn run build:languages && yarn run build:languages.min
scripts.build:commonjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs_dist env-cmd ./hot.config.js babel src --out-dir commonjs
scripts.build:es: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es env-cmd ./hot.config.js babel src --out-dir es
scripts.watch: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=watch env-cmd ./hot.config.js webpack --hide-modules --watch src/index.js
scripts.prepublish: yarn run clean && yarn run build:commonjs && yarn run build:es
